formElement.label: IIS IP Address:
formElement.documentation: IP Address of IIS Server. e.g. 192.168.1.100

formElement.label: IIS Port:
formElement.documentation: IP Port of the IIS Server. If port is 80, leave the field blank.

formElement.label: Computer Name:
formElement.documentation: Computer name into scripts will be run. e.g. SRV01

formElement.label: IIS Version:
formElement.documentation: Selects current IIS version that will be integrated through the plugin
